title: Functional Medicine Primary Care
author: Balance Health Florida
description: Balance Your Health with our Functional Medicine Practitioner!
cleaned_text: Functional medicine coming soon! Complete "contact us" form to reserve your spot Functional medicine coming soon! Complete "contact us" form to reserve your spot We are hard at work getting the practice up and running. Drop us a message if you'd like to be added to the waiting list to discuss Balance Health Florida's comprehensive evidence-based functional medicine program. In the meantime, check out our price list under "services". Welcome to our functional medicine practice, owned and operated by nurse practitioners. Our experienced medical professionals put your healing needs first. We are proud to provide a high quality level of customer service, compassionate care, and commitment to health and wellness to all of our patients with a focus on functional medicine and holistic healing, based on your preferences. Our goal is to keep you healthy using scientifically-backed methods for health and wellness. Our promise to you is we will ensure your concerns are addressed every visit. We currently offer telemedicine visits for care from the convenience of your own home. With over 20 years of healthcare experience, our team will work with you to create a wellness plan that's right for you, backed by scientific evidence, with a focus on functional medicine and holistic methods for healing. We will combine proven holistic approaches where appropriate with modern medical treatments to ensure you get the level of care you need, want, and deserve. Not only will our providers partner with you to treat your existing conditions, we also work to maximize your prevention strategies. We will provide you with the tools and resources you need to improve your quality of life and achieve your wellness goals using evidence-based functional medicine techniques. We place a strong emphasis on healthy living through nutrition and lifestyle modifications: You will be amazed at the level of wellness you can achieve. Obesity Medicine Association [https://obesitymedicine.org/](https://obesitymedicine.org/) Institute for Functional Medicine [https://www.ifm.org/](https://www.ifm.org/) American College of Lifestyle Medicine [https://lifestylemedicine.org/](https://lifestylemedicine.org/) Florida Association of Nurse Practitioners [https://www.flanp.org/](https://www.flanp.org/) We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your website experience. By accepting our use of cookies, your data will be aggregated with all other user data.
